Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 4
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IV; sheet 4; Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto 7 (latter part)-9; Verso 4-5. Recto: Monotheistic Hymns Verso: A Student's Miscellany
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner. Hieratic Papyri, Vol. 1, pp. 28-44. Vol. 2. Plates 15 & 15A, Recto 7 (latter part)-8. Plate 16, Recto 9; Plate 19, Verso 4; Plates 20 & 20A, Verso 5. The verso of this manuscript is available om T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381089)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink (smudged) Red ink Tabbed: silk Displayed in Room 62 until 1998 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
